metadata.title: CVE-2019-6992 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A stored-self XSS exists in web/skins/classic/views/controlcaps.php ofZoneMinder through 1.32.3, allowing an attacker to execute HTML orJavaScript code in a vulnerable field via a long NAME or PROTOCOL to theindex.php?view=controlcaps URI.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
